description:
### **Content**
###### This dataset collects homeowners' opinions on home renovation services, especially energy-efficient ones 🏡
Questions include general information, potential reasons for renovation, pricing, design preference, timing, and process of renovation 💡

### **Size of Data**
###### The final number of respondents got is 41, including people from North America, South America, Europe, and Australia.
title: Home Renovation Data: America, Europe, Australia
